TopicTitle: KSP V22 Science Intro With Special Guest: ET !

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I added a little video short before and after the new KSP V22 Intro - It was a live video feed on the fly.

It has a few hiccups but turned out okay !

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta/b/470848109

I didnt see a video slot so I placed it in animation.

Enjoy (!) and Be sure to be on the look out for my streams ! I hope to stream V22 soon; havnt started playing yet, but as soon as I do it goes live !

Cdr Zeta
